item.title: React React Router: Setting parent component state based on route change event
item.description: I’ve been working on a React Reach Router based application that has several routes and wanted to show a search box in the header unless the user was on the search page. After a lot of trial and error I learnt that I could use a route change event listener to do this. The CodeSandbox below shows all the code to do this: Let’s walk through the code.
